resp = client.search(
    index="cooking_blog",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "term": {
                        "category.keyword": "Main Course"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "term": {
                        "tags": "vegetarian"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "range": {
                        "rating": {
                            "gte": 4.5
                        }
                    }
                }
            ],
            "should": [
                {
                    "multi_match": {
                        "query": "curry spicy",
                        "fields": [
                            "title^2",
                            "description"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                {
                    "range": {
                        "date": {
                            "gte": "now-1M/d"
                        }
                    }
                }
            ],
            "must_not": [
                {
                    "term": {
                        "category.keyword": "Dessert"
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
